buginformation.summary: missing type checks for var args notation
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem compile this closure compiler compilation level simple optimizations warning level verbose output file name default formatting pretty print closure compiler param string var args function foo var args return arguments length foo hello warning foo 123 warning foo hello 123 warning error what the expected output what you see instead should get type mismatch warning for the second parameter the third foo call what version the product are you using what operating system both online compiler and the 20100616 release please provide any additional information below seems like the type checker treats var args single param and thus fails type check the subsequent parameters fredrik this issue was closed revision 402
